long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**Introduction**

Splicing URL is a gadget that can quickly splicing the current URL and open a new website. This extension is open source with MIT licenses. For more details, see: https://github.com/LightAPIs/splicing-url
long.zh_CN:
**介绍**

Splicing URL 是一个可以快速拼接当前网址并打开新网站的小工具。本插件采用 MIT 许可进行开源，更多详情可以参见：https://github.com/LightAPIs/splicing-url
